# T = 180 # number of epoc for theta
# N = 100000 # number of smples, comes form true Prob
# N_est = 100 # number of smples, comes form estimated Prob
# ypc = 1 # descent ratio
# cord = 0 # changiable spin variable when gibbus sampling time step
# beta = 0.01
